channel.title: 1 question simple but hard plz HELP (LOOK)
channel.description:
Alright i got Login server working But.. when i try to login it doesnt allow me to go on it says Error connecting. but i checked and everything is working plus when i run Run_server.bat it just opens and closes.. bcuz there is no wildtelly (i think)
and how do i make an acc?? (im running HavokOnline) Please help
Best regards, Zanakinz

item.title: 1 question simple but hard plz HELP (LOOK)
item.dc:creator: @adu adu
item.description:
@adu wrote:

Goto your conf file and remove wildytele to add a file name wildy tele to npchandler

Read full topic
